EVJ.A: The global maximum heat value is {0.95}.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Streaming and Revenue or the cell corresponding to Movies and Sponsorship?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Streaming} and {Revenue} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Football and Sponsorship or the cell corresponding to Streaming and Sponsorship?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Streaming} and {Sponsorship} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.19 to 0.36?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Events, Attendance), (Streaming, Attendance), (Events, Fan Engagement), (Movies, Fan Engagement), (Football, Ratings), (Basketball, Revenue), (Streaming, Revenue), (Basketball, Royalties), (Events, Royalties), (Events, Social Media), (Events, Sponsorship), (Music, Sponsorship)}.
